item.name: Decompression air cushion
item.txt: Nan Ya TPU synthetic leather can withstand continuous inflation and deflation cycles without leaking, providing effective alternate decompression effects for the product.

item.name: TPU bath bed
item.txt: Excellent washing resistance,unique anti-slip texture and skin-friendly material.

item.name: The best choice for popular collocation and easy processing
item.txt: TPU film and hot melt material which easily hot press with fabric is visually simple, popular, and lightweight.

item.name: Transfer bed cloth
item.txt: Special coating and TPU coating enhance slippery movement and easy cleaning.

item.subTitle: ・TPU film embossed with excellent skin-friendly feeling
item.txt: Excellent coating barrier and Nan Ya's unique TPU film are dense and finely embossed, with the characteristics of easy cleaning, refreshing, and no burden.

item.subTitle: ・Strong adhesion and easy processing
item.txt: TPU film has strong adhesion characteristics, no air leakage during filling and discharging, no twisting of the tube, stable quality, and easy processing.

item.subTitle: ・Medical grade, food grade FDA certification, etc.
item.txt: Complete biocompatibility, anti-mildew and anti-bacterial, FDA, and other certification tests provide security for medical applications.

item.subTitle: ・It can be sterilized by EO and GAMMA
item.txt: It can be EO and GAMMA sterilized and still has an excellent sterile barrier. It has multiple processing and applications, low disinfection cost, easy monitoring, and is suitable for medical-grade and food-grade TPU membranes.
・Combined with various fabric coatings to improve scratch resistance, non-penetrating or piercing, excellent protection for outdoor sports.
・Foaming material strengthens shock absorption and impact resistance, cold resistance and heat resistance are better than ordinary plastics, effectively prolonging product life.
・Suitable for high-frequency, hot-pressing, and other processing, no sewing, simple and beautiful visual, and waterproof.
・Hand-feeling hardness, functional embossing, special design, etc. can be directly developed from the material side.
・Nan Ya has a variety of processing techniques, and can immediately provide solutions for color, texture, embossing, or leather and fabric composites.
・Processing experience and suggestions, selected for the solutions of scraping, anti-penetration, tear-resistance, and processability.
・Composite with hot-melt adhesive, the functional TPU tape is bonded to various materials through the hot-melt adhesive.
・Non-toxic, odorless, oil-resistant, without any plasticizers, solvents, and other additives, suitable for food contact FDA-grade films.
・Nan Ya's unique wheel embossing printing, while providing function and visual aesthetics in the printing and scratch-resistant surface layer.
・Provide options for scratch-resistant, anti-penetration, tear-resistant, and processability solutions for applications.
・Composite with hot-melt adhesive, the functional TPU tape is bonded to various materials through the hot-melt adhesive.

item.title: Product Specifications
item.txt: Provide optimal solutions for TPU composite materials and display functionality, and provide professional tailor-made suggestions according to application requirements and processing requirements, allowing you to quickly develop ideal products and put them into practice!

item.title: Innovative R&D
item.txt: The pioneer leader in the integration of materials and processing, grasping the new trends of product, Nan Ya TPU has cooperated with professional R&D teams to carry out in-depth research on smart wear, high moisture permeability, and high barrier to human body contact. Your participation is welcome to inject innovation into product development and new opportunities!

item.title: Processing Application
item.txt: With many processing processes, non-toxic high-frequency and hot-press processing, reducing sewing to improve batch processing economy, excellent waterproof effect, uniform and firm air-tight, enhanced durability, and other characteristics. The printing process can pass through the film material, a high scratch-resistant film protection effect, effectively protecting the printing layer, and is the first choice for the alternative material of the film material.

carousel.title: Use Combinations
carousel.txt: Diversified and complex technologies provide you with exclusive embossing options with multiple levels of vision, functional weather resistance and a variety of texture presentations. Nan Ya's one-stop solution is perfectly achieved, allowing you to easily and conveniently obtain it instantly.

certification.title: Quality Assurance
certification.txt: Nan Ya's quality can be verified by you, has passed the tests of biocompatibility, irritation and allergies, and cytotoxicity. It is a reliable choice for you to purchase with peace of mind. In order to continue to maintain the leading position of the brand, We continue to devote ourselves to the acquisition of comprehensive certifications such as medical, outdoor, and composite, we welcome your inquiries and suggestions.

content.title: High Frequency Processing
content.txt: Non-toxic and with no additional additives, Nan Ya pure TPU, is the first choice for high-frequency medical use, with good tensile and inflatable strength and rigidity, providing reliable, simple, and modularized products for various medical inflatable products, outdoor air cushion products, leisure composite, and waterproof products. The best choice for mass production.
content.subTitle: Currently applied to

content.title: Printing Processing
content.txt: Through embossed transfer, it can provide protection for the printing layer to prevent abrasion and visual multi-level presentation, such as vertical and horizontal printing patterns, spun carbon fiber weaving, lenticular patterns, and plain printing on the back to ensure printing color fastness and resolution.
